Privacy policy

This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose personal information when you visit our ebook funnel page.

Information We Collect

  • When you visit our ebook funnel page, we may collect certain information automatically, including your IP address, browser type, and operating system.
  • If you choose to purchase an ebook, we will collect your name, email address, and payment information through our payment processor, Stripe.

How We Use Your Information

  • We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, process payments, and communicate with you about your purchase.
  • We do not share your personal information with third parties except for our payment processor, Stripe, which processes payments securely.

Data Security

  • We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

Your Choices

  • You can choose not to provide personal information when visiting our ebook funnel page, but this may prevent you from making a purchase.
  • You can opt out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the instructions in the email.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

  • We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at roberow@proton.me.

By using our ebook funnel page, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

Please note that this is a general template and should be customized to accurately reflect your practices and comply with applicable laws and regulations.
